oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prevalence of tail biting in pigs and associations to carcass condemnations - a Finnish pilot study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Valros, A.
Ahlström, S.
Rintala, H.
Häkkinen, T.
Saloniemi, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this study was to investigate the prevalence of tail biting in Finland and the relationship between tail biting and carcass condemnation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Valros, A.; Ahlström, S.; Rintala, H.; Häkkinen, T. and Saloniemi, H. (2003) Prevalence of tail biting in pigs and associations to carcass condemnations - a Finnish pilot study. Paper at: 37th International congress of the ISAE, Abano Terme, Italy, June, 24-28 2003.
